english.segment1: You have shown us what is holy. How to bless the Father's heart. To act justly and love mercy. To walk humbly with our God
english.segment2: This is who you are. This is who you are
english.segment3: Friend of sinners, our Deliverer. Jesus, Savior of the world. Sent from heaven, King of Glory. Yet the Servant of us all
english.segment4: So give us hearts to help the widow. Give us hands that feed the poor. Give us words that bring your healing. To this hurts and broken world
english.segment5: 'Cause this is who you are. This is who you are
english.segment6: Friend of sinners, our Deliverer. Jesus, Savior of the world. Sent from heaven, King of Glory. Yet the Servant of us all
english.segment7: In kindness and meekness. You've revealed the unseen God. In mercy You've shown us. Who You are
english.segment8: Friend of sinners, our Deliverer. Jesus, Savior of the world. Sent from heaven, King of Glory. Yet the Servant of us all
english.segment9: You, Friend of sinners, our Deliverer. Jesus, Savior of the world. Sent from heaven, King of Glory. Yet the Servant of us all
